title: Rebeiw
review: I thought the acting was: really good, you can't get me to say anything elseI thought the costumes were: a bit weird cause it was back in the dayI thought the sets were: cool i thinkI thought the colors were: do i look like i can describe that question?I thought thw music was: way too intenseI thought the storyline was: quite heart wrenchingWhat i liked most of the movie: the beautiful scenes when they're outsideWhat i liked least of the movie: the unnecessary intense musicWould i recommend this movie? To whom? Nah, don't think anyone would be interested
